<style>/* INFINITE SCROLL CSS */

/* BREAKPOINT: Desktop (BASE) */
.brxe-tnvmtb .brxe-jrvrok.brxe-text-link {padding-top: 0; padding-right: 10px; padding-bottom: 0; padding-left: 10px; border-radius: 5px; background-color: var(--bricks-color-815bb4); position: absolute; right: 10px; top: 10px; color: #ffffff}


/* BREAKPOINT: Desktop (BASE) */
.brxe-tnvmtb .brxe-pgsofq.brxe-heading {width: 70%; font-size: 25px; margin-bottom: 10px}

/* BREAKPOINT: Mobile portrait */
@media (max-width: 478px) {
.brxe-tnvmtb .brxe-pgsofq.brxe-heading {width: 100%}
}

/* BREAKPOINT: Desktop (BASE) */
.brxe-tnvmtb .brxe-bnvjah.brxe-text-link {gap: 10px}


/* BREAKPOINT: Desktop (BASE) */
.brxe-tnvmtb .brxe-oacqsb.brxe-text-link {gap: 10px}


/* BREAKPOINT: Desktop (BASE) */
.brxe-tnvmtb .brxe-vgutom.brxe-block {row-gap: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px}


/* BREAKPOINT: Desktop (BASE) */
.brxe-tnvmtb .brxe-pllyey.brxe-button {background-color: var(--bricks-color-kmirhv); color: #ffffff; border: 1px solid var(--bricks-color-kmirhv); border-radius: 10px; transition: 0.3s}
.brxe-tnvmtb .brxe-pllyey.brxe-button:hover {background-color: #ffffff; color: #000000}


/* BREAKPOINT: Desktop (BASE) */
.brxe-tnvmtb .brxe-giwigq.brxe-button {background-color: var(--bricks-color-kmirhv); color: #ffffff; border: 1px solid var(--bricks-color-kmirhv); border-radius: 10px; transition: 0.3s}
.brxe-tnvmtb .brxe-giwigq.brxe-button:hover {color: #000000; background-color: #ffffff}


/* BREAKPOINT: Desktop (BASE) */
.brxe-tnvmtb.brxe-block {border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: 0 0 11px 0 rgba(158, 158, 158, 0.6); background-color: #ffffff; padding-top: 30px; padding-right: 30px; padding-bottom: 30px; padding-left: 30px; position: relative; transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out; row-gap: 10px; justify-content: space-between}
.brxe-tnvmtb:hover { background-color:#142e5d; color:white;} .brxe-tnvmtb :hover #brxe-gkzbfv{  background-color:white !important; color:black !important;}

/* BREAKPOINT: Mobile portrait */
@media (max-width: 478px) {
.brxe-tnvmtb.brxe-block {padding-top: 50px}
}
</style>
